But, we also gathered some unexpected gifts that can hopefully surprise that special someone in your life. Shop our roundup of the best Valentine’s Day gifts of 2025 below.

Best Valentine’s Day Gifts for Her

You can never go wrong with roses, but if you’re looking to add a little bit more excitement this holiday, we’ve gather a variety of fun, stylish, thoughtful, and intimate gifts that could make can make her Valentine’s Day even more special.

Catbird Twin Hearts Gold Stacking Ring

What’s better than one heart? Twin 14k gold hearts!

Lululemon City Essentials Mini Shoulder Bag 1L

The viral crescent moon-shaped Lululemon bag is a great affordable gift that’ll have her leaving her designer bags in the closet.

Stanley Valentine’s Day Quencher H2.0 FlowState Tumbler

Nothing says, “I love you,” more than keeping your partner hydrated.

UrbanStems “The Valentine” Bouquet

Don’t overthink your Valentine’s Day gift. A well-curated flower arrangement will always be an incredible choice. Use code: PMC15 for 15% off.

SKIMS Sleep Longe-Sleeve Button Up Set

These ultra-soft and comfy sleep set feels as good as they look. The set features a slightly oversized button-up top with long sleeves, a chest pocket, and elegant piping details. The straight leg pants have a relaxed fit and a stretchy waistband for a nice, cozy fit.

Cozy Earth Cuddle Blanket

After very deliberate couch testing (lazy mornings in and multiple binge watching sessions), I can firmly say this is one of the coziest blankets on the market. You and your partner may never leave the house again.

Mr. & Mrs. Night Lead Free Crystal Night Water Set

If she loves to collect fun, eccentric decor, this “dusty rose” glass water set will be a great centerpiece in any room. Choose between a short and tall version.

Mejuri Pavé Diamond Huggie Hoop Earrings

Surprise her with these stunning outfit-elevating diamond hoop earrings that are handcrafted in recycled 14k solid gold.

Savage x Fenty Puff Cherries 2-Piece Set

Gift her a mix of cute and sexy with this GloRilla-approved two-piece set. Worn by the rapper in her latest “Glo Up Close” campaign, the unlined demi bra, is made from a delicate sheer fabric with cute yet sexy puff-print cherries all over, and featuring adjustable, supportive straps.

What I Love About Your Journal

What do you love about your sweetheart? This fill-in-the-blank book is a unique gift that lets you show your love in a special way.

LEGO Flower Bouquet

A fun twist on gifting regular flowers that will surely put a smile on her face.

Smythson Matches Valentine’s Day Card

Looking for the perfect Valentine’s Card? Each card is engraved in Smythson’s signature white wove paper and comes with an envelope that has been tissue-lined by hand. The cards are blank inside leaving you all the room to show your loved one how much you care.

Fujifilm instax Mini SE Instant Camera

Capture every romantic moment on film. For extra points, get her a photo album as well.

Ethelm Cherry Cordials 12-Piece Premium Chocolate Assortment Box

Valentine’s Day candy that will get you buzzed! These boozy candies are spiked with Paul Mason VSOP Brandy and topped with a dark chocolate coating.

Briefly Stated ‘I Have a Heart On for You’ Men’s Boxer Shorts

Another way to show your love, these heart-print boxers from Amazon speak for themselves. The cotton boxers (available in S-XXL) have received dozens of positive customer reviews for their comfortable fit and affordable price. Click here to shop men’s boxers and boxer briefs up to 7XL.

MyMini Heart Waffle Maker

Small but mighty, this mini waffle maker makes a great gift for a breakfast-obsessed foodie! The waffle maker includes nonstick coating and an ultra-compact design for easy storage.

Diptyque Roses Large Scented Candle

A signature candle hand-poured with perfume-grade fragrance oils that will fill up her room with a lovely floral scent. It’s gift that keeps on giving.

Best Valentine’s Day Gifts for Him

We’ve gathered plenty of sweet gear and spicy gifts for you to shop this Valentine’s Day. From incredibly smelling winter perfume, to adorable baby Yoda speakers, to intimate card games, there’s plenty of great products to wow your man this holiday.

Vinyl Me Please Subscription

Vinyl Me Please is an exciting gift for music lovers that keeps on giving. This monthly subscription service sends a freshly pressed vinyl record (in the genre of your choosing) right to your doorstep. Choose from timeless classics or more modern releases in either hip-hop, country, classics, essentials, or rock.

Tom Ford Private Blend Tobacco Vanille Eau de Parfum

Upgrade his scent to one of the best winter fragrances on the market. It’s versatile blend of spice, vanilla sweetness, and smokey tobacco notes make this scent perfect day or night.

YETI Rambler 20 oz Cocktail Shaker

Why go out when you can make whip up an ice cold extra dirty martini right at home? With customizable text and graphic options and a wide variety of colors to choose from, this double-wall vacuum insulated shaker is a fun gift for the mixologist in your life.

Bitty Boomers Star Wars The Mandalorian: Grogu Mini Speaker

Look how cute this is! Even if he’s not a Star Wars fan, this little cup of joy will bring happiness to anyone who opens it. The force is strong with this mini speaker.

The Couples Game

A great couples game that is less of a stress-inducing “how well do you know your partner” experience. With questions like, “what emoji best describes our relationship?” or “which celebrities would we cast to play us in a movie?” this game brings out a more light-hearted silliness to getting to know your partner even more.

Flint and Tinder Flannel-Lined Waxed Trucker Jacket

This scene-stealing jacket, worn by Pedro Pascal in the Last of Us series, is an essential must-have for any wardrobe. Your man will never take it off.

Away “The Bigger” Carry-On Luggage

The popular carry-on suitcase is perfect for a weekend getaway or a romantic couples retreat in to the Caribbean. Offered in an array of colors to mix and match with your loved one, the luggage features a lightweight, durable hard shell with an easy-grip handle to make maneuvering through an airport a breeze.

Braun Series 9 9440 All-in-One Style Kit

This all-in-one grooming set will keep his beard flourishing all winter long.

Horti String of Hearts Hanging Basket

What says “be my Valentine” more than a heart shaped plant? Liven up his place with some greenery, and in the spring and summer, the string of hearts will also produce small purple flowers.

Sex Deck: Playful Positions to Spice Up Your Love Life

Spice up your life with this intimate deck that include 50 diagrams of playful positions, helpful pointers, and preferences.

Mixology Bartender Kit: 10-Piece Bar Tool Set with Bamboo Stand |

A gift for amateur bartenders and skilled mixologists. This 10-piece cocktail kit contains a shaker, muddler, jigger, spoon, strainer, corkscrew, ice tongs and two liquor pourers.

Best Tech Gifts for Valentine’s Day

Shopping for tech lovers? From speakers to earbuds, record players and other gadgets, see below for a roundup of tech gifts to shop for Valentine’s Day.

JBL Clip 4 – Portable Mini Bluetooth Speaker

Sound on the go. Stream your favorite songs wireless with the JBL Clip 4. The portable speaker offers up to 10 hours of playtime and it’s available in a bunch of colors including pink, black, white red, blue, gold and teal.

Apple Watch Series 10 [GPS + Cellular 42mm]

The Series 10 is the most up-to-date timepiece in Apple’s watch series. It’s equipped with an always-on retina display, optical heart sensor, sleep monitor, blood oxygen sensor, 32 GB of storage, Bluetooth 5.0 and the battery lasts for up to 18 hours on a single charge. Apple Watch Series 8 is available in a range of different colors including, red, black, white and blue.

U-Turn Audio Orbit Plus Turntable

Let the U-Turn audio turntable be the centerpiece of your room. Thanks to a variety of bold color options, as well as, oak and walnut finishes, it’s super easy to mix and match this record player with the rest of your home aesthetic.

Victrola 6-in-1 Nostalgic Bluetooth Record Player with 3-Speed Turntable and CD Player

Perfect for a living room, office or bedroom, this retro-style Victrola, 6-in-1, 3-speed turntable features a CD and cassette player. The record player features upgraded premium sound quality with three RPM speeds (33 1/3, 45 and 78). The record player also has Bluetooth and wired connection options to play music from a desired device.

Apple AirPods Max

Apple’s entry into the world of premium headphones is a pricey one, but the Airpods Max deliver rich, detailed sound with incredible active noise-cancelling. For the fashionistas, these over-ear headphones have also become a staple style accessory with its catchy modern design and variety of color options. If you want to listen to music and look great doing it, there’s no better option than the Airpods Max.

Sonos Move 2 Speaker

Its simple minimalistic design makes the Sonos Move 2 an easy fit in most rooms. In some ways, the speaker looks too nice to be used as an outdoor speaker, but with an IP56 rating, its durable exterior allows it to withstand falls, bumps, rain and moisture, dust and dirt, UV light, and extreme temperatures. Offered in either white, black, or a pleasant olive color, the Move 2 is a great fit for any scenario.
